humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle starts with " self ", "ÁïÄ" sound. " Zi " is in the shape of a nose, and "ÁïÄ" is a sound symbol. The original meaning is nose.

Oracle is used as the place name, "Collection" 8189: "Cai (in) nose".

" Zi " is like a human nose. " Zi " may originally be pronounced as " nose. " Later, " Zi " was used to express oneself, and the sound of "ÁïÄ" was added to differentiate the word " nose " to indicate the nose. The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the original meaning to express the nose, "Guodianjian. "Five Elements" Jane 45: "Ears, Eyes, Nose, Mouth, Hands and Feet". "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. "Closed Diagnosis Style" Jane 53: "Prick his nose without sneezes (sneezes)".

The ancestor is called the "originator", because both " nose " and " ancestor " have the original meaning. Yang Xiong believes that the nose comes out first when animals are born, just as the head comes out first when people are born, so nose has the original meaning. "Dialect": "The nose is the beginning. The first birth is the nose, and the first birth of the person is the first. Liang Yijian said the nose is the beginning, or the ancestor; the ancestor is the home."

The human nose is bulging and protruding, so the protruding part on the utensil is also called the nose. For example, the printed button is also called the " nose ." "Guang Ya. "Shiqi": "The seal is the seal, and the button is the nose." Wang Niansun Shuzheng: "Button, the nose is also printed." The part with holes on the utensil is also called the " nose ", Yu Xin's Qixi Fu: "Acupuncture nose" Thin and hollow."

"Shuowen": "Nose, entrains the air from one's body. From oneself to one's body. All nose belongs to from the nose."

Meaning Mnemonic
You are all by your lonesome self and you have to check twenty rice paddies. The thing you have to check is the smell of all the rice paddies to see if they're ready for harvest. At each one, you open up your nose and smell deeply.
Focus in on your nose. Your nostrils get huge, and your nose is huge. Smell the rice in your imagination. Your nose is amazing.
